speaker: char
text: Jiggly day to you! I’m feeling good today, thank you for asking. I decided to stop dating.

speaker: char
text: I really liked the last person, but I just couldn’t imagine being with them in a relationship.

speaker: char
text: I’m truly happy on my own and simply don’t care about being in a relationship just for the sake of it. I think it’s better just to focus on myself rather than focus on something I’m not interested in, don’t you think?

speaker: char
text: I think your makeup helped me realize it’s okay to do things just for myself. So please, do my makeup again, just for me this time.

speaker: char
text: And you can leave the lights on.
